post.description: Creates a new experiment with the provided configuration

members.description: Optional array of member objects with userId and role

protocols.description: Optional array of protocol objects with protocolId and order to associate with the experiment

get.description: Returns a list of experiments based on the specified filter criteria, including search.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter experiments by relationship to the user

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific experiment

patch.description: Updates an existing experiment with the provided changes

delete.description: Deletes an experiment and all associated data

get.description: Returns experiment details along with user access and admin status
get.summary: Get experiment details with access information

get.description: Returns a list of all users who are members of the specified experiment

post.description: Adds multiple members to the experiment with specified roles

userId.description: ID of the user to add as a member

role.description: Role to assign to the new member

delete.description: Removes a member from the experiment

get.description: Retrieves data tables from the experiment with pagination support

parameters.name: tableName
parameters.description: Optional table name to filter results to a specific table

post.description: Receives status updates from Databricks workflows and updates the corresponding experiment status

get.description: Returns a list of protocol associations for the specified experiment.
get.summary: List protocols associated with an experiment

post.description: Associates one or more protocols with an experiment.

delete.description: Removes the association between a protocol and an experiment.
delete.summary: Remove a protocol from an experiment

get.description: Returns the flow graph for the specified experiment.

post.description: Creates a new flow for the experiment with the provided graph.

put.description: Updates the existing flow for the experiment with the provided graph.

post.description: Uploads experiment data files to Databricks

get.description: Returns a list of macros based on the specified filter criteria

post.description: Creates a new macro with the given properties and processes the code file through Databricks

get.description: Returns a macro by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing macro and optionally processes a new code file through Databricks

delete.description: Deletes a macro by its ID

get.description: Returns a list of protocols based on the specified filter criteria

post.description: Creates a new protocol with the given properties

get.description: Returns a protocol by its ID

patch.description: Updates a protocol with the given properties

delete.description: Deletes a protocol by its ID

get.description: Search for users by name or email with pagination support

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for name or email

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of users to skip for pagination

get.description: Returns a single user by their unique identifier

post.description: Creates user profile and sets the user as registered

get.description: Returns the user's profile information including firstName, lastName, bio, and organization

info.title: OpenJII API
info.description: REST API documentation for the OpenJII platform
